summary.value: Boost the transformations of custom weapons.

system.description:
Requirements: you must have mastered one or more Classes among Sharpshooter and Weaponmaster.

When you transform a transforming custom weapon on your turn, choose one option:

  • If you have not performed any attacks during this turn, the next attack you perform with this weapon during this turn deals 5 extra damage.

  • If you hit one or more creatures with an attack using this weapon during this turn, you recover 5 Hit Points and 5 Mind Points.

You Receive: @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.0jslWSatV2i8SKix] or @EFFECT[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.3PRgAxgGjeOiBjKg]
